rows.label: tev065101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev065101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gi Zang about Ga Jiarg.

rows.label: tev065101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev065101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gi Zang about recent developments.

rows.label: tev065101_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Gi Zang about recent developments.

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0001
rows.name:
When the Hundred Hellions made the choice to
oppose the Ganglion, Prince Jiarg offered to fight
alongside us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0002
rows.name: But Grandfather stopped him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0003
rows.name:
"Let the Hellions be the face of the rebellion," he said.
"Our prince would honor us more by keeping Wroth
alive, even if it means reluctant obedience."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Prince Jiarg wept, but he took Grandfather's hand and
swore to continue on a nonviolent path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0005
rows.name:
The prince returned the favor after Grandfather died.
I was prepared to run to my death killing as many
as I could, but Prince Jiarg convinced me to live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0006
rows.name:
He is a remarkable person. No amount of training
could shape me into one half as great.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hail, [ST:playername ]!
You look stronger than ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0012
rows.name:
I have been teaching Hundred Hellion fighting
techniques to Ni Gombe and the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Before, I believed driving a blade through as many
Ganglion as possible was the only way to honor my
grandfather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0014
rows.name:
But this way is betterâ€”passing on Grandfather's
techniques and keeping their memory alive.
He would be happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG0015
rows.name: What do you think? Have I chosen correctly?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG1001
rows.name: Bah! Beaten again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG1002
rows.name: Yours is a terrifying strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG1003
rows.name:
None other could have triumphed over a peerless
warrior like Zo Ozuchi the way you did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG1004
rows.name:
Heh. No matter. Even if some great chasm separates
my skill from yours, I shall not cease trying to cross it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065101_MSG1005
rows.name:
Know this, mighty [ST:playername ]!
One day I will gain great strength, defeat you,
and become the finest warrior under the sky![ST:wait ]
